title: Desible scaling the UWP app programatically
body: I would like to prevent that the content of my UWP app after changing the default Windows scaling being scaled. Windows scaling should no longer affect UWP app scaling. I know, this feature does not exist for UWP Desktop, it exist just for Xbox: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.ui.viewmanagement.applicationviewscaling. It would also be very helpful for UWP desktop applications.
